articles.description: A US navy destroyer sunk during World War II and lying nearly 6,500 metres below sea level off the Philippines has been reached in the world's deepest shipwreck dive, an American exploration team said.
articles.title: 'Deepest wreck dive' reaches US WWII ship off Philippines - News24
